abstract: R. Albert Mohler spelled out why traditional Christians do not consider the Mormon Church to be part of Christianity.
snippet: R. Albert Mohler spelled out why traditional Christians do not consider the Mormon Church to be part of Christianity.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)

lead_paragraph: A leading Southern Baptist theologian spoke out Monday on the question of Mormons, Christianity and elections, clearly trying to soften the harsh message of Robert Jeffress, a Southern Baptist pastor who created a political tempest over the weekend.

headline.main: A Theologian Weighs In on the Mormon Church
